thread.title: The Kapil Sharma-Sunil Grover Drama Continues, With Sunil Asking Kapil To "Start Respecting Humans"
thread.title_full: The Kapil Sharma-Sunil Grover Drama Continues, With Sunil Asking Kapil To "Start Respecting Humans"

title: The Kapil Sharma-Sunil Grover Drama Continues, With Sunil Asking Kapil To "Start Respecting Humans"
text:
facebook 124 SHARES 
Kapil Sharma and Sunil Grover's fight was all over the Internet, yesterday. For the uninitiated, Sunil had requested Kapil to not use foul language in front of women during a flight to Mumbai. Kapil, who was reportedly under the influence of alcohol, ended up abusing Sunil and having a physical fight with him. Kapil then took to Facebook to deny the rumours while Sunil refused to comment when Times Of India called him up to clarify. "I would not like to comment anything at all on it," was his response to questions about the fight and whether or not he will return to the show. 
Kapil took to Twitter last night to apologise to Sunil. Paji @WhoSunilGrover sry if I hurt u unintentionally.u knw vry well how much I luv u. M also upset .love n regards always:) 
Sunil responded to his Tweet with this note. From a friend, with love @KapilSharmaK9 pic.twitter.com/2c7uQ5jqH5 â€” Sunil Grover (@WhoSunilGrover) 21 March 2017 
Kapil later responded to him. @WhoSunilGrover paji dil jitt liya tusi.. now I love u more n more n more .. hun bada mazaa aan wala a.. akal aan to baad.. I love u.
